Record.BroaderTerm: Autoimmune Diseases of the Nervous System
Record.Synonym: Central Nervous System Systemic Lupus Erythematosis
Record.Description: Central nervous system vasculitis that is associated with SYSTEMIC LUPUS ERYTHEMATOSUS. Clinical manifestations may include DEMENTIA; SEIZURES; CRANIAL NERVE DISEASES; HEMIPARESIS; BLINDNESS; DYSPHASIA; and other neurological disorders.
